text: Silverman believes it to be for eight years. Tex is believed to be seeking more than $21MM per year, closer to Alex Rodriguez's $27.5MM per year. The Angels are reportedly at eight years and at least $160MM, the Orioles around seven years, $140 - 150MM, and the Nationals at eight years, $160MM.
title: According to Michael Silverman of the Boston Herald, the Red Sox made an offer to Mark Teixeira.
